DOC.brief_title: The Development Autistic Children Based Mothers´Response Autism Behavior Checklist
DOC.detailed_description: Aim : We evaluate process development autistic child , direct indirect intervention context mother´s response Autism Behavior Checklist . Method : The sample compose 11 mother child diagnose Autism ( 6 ) Asperger Syndrome ( 5 ) , accord criterion establish DSM IVtr ( APA , 2002 ) . These child randomly divide two group : Six receive direct indirect intervention ( Therapy Group -TG ) , five receive exclusively indirect intervention ( Orientation Group - OG ) . We use Autism Behavior Checklist ( Krug et al. , 1993 ) , adapt Portuguese three occasion : beginning , six month later 12 month later . This list nonadaptive behavior ( 57 ) , area : Sensorial , Body Object Use , Language , Social Relating .
DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis Autism Asperger Syndrome Age ( child ) Adherence study ( least 70 % ) Others clinical diagnosis
